writer.name: 埃马努埃尔·希卡内德 Emanuel Schikaneder

director.name: 西蒙·迈克伯尼 Simon McBurney

introduction: Renowned director and actor Simon McBurney recently made his Metropolitan Opera debut with a daring reimagination of Die Zauberflöte (The Magic Flute), and the critics are hailing it as a highlight of the season. The Financial Times calls the production as “Equal parts dazzling, grounded and laugh-out-loud funny… ★★★★★,” with the Observer declaring that it “captures the anything-can-happen shimmer that defines live theater.” Experience Mozart’s beloved fable live from the Met stage to cinemas nationwide, featuring soprano Erin Morley and tenor Lawrence Brownlee under the baton of Maestro Nathalie Stutzmann.
